title: Online Learning Environment Design and Effective Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening online learning design capabilities by applying Merrill’s principles of instruction in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning modules by applying Merrill’s First Principles of Instruction (5P model)
Learners can develop a learner acceptance evaluation framework by analyzing the perceived usefulness and ease-of-use factors of the TAM model
Learners can propose qualitative improvement plans for online learning environments based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
